BSI_STATUS_COLOR_CHANGE_NOTE: **Note**: Due to limitations, colour changes won't take affect straight away. To fix this, please either go to a different guild or channel. If you've modified the "Invisible" colour, you may need to change your status.
BSI_STATUS_DISPLAY_CLASSIC_OPT: Classic: Tried and true colour-blind mode.
BSI_CLIENT_SWITCH_MATCH_COLOR_DESC: Fills the {client} status indicator with the corresponding colour of their status.
BSI_MOBILE_SWITCH_MATCH_COLOR_DESC: Fills the mobile status indicator with the corresponding colour of their status; requires the mobile "Avatar Status" setting to be disabled.
